website_summaries.verdict: A small set of quality chips that's a good choice for beginners.
pros: For an affordable set of 11.5 gram clay composite chips, this is the one to go with
The chips feel nice in the hand and come in four colors
A tray is included and different design options are available
cons: Equal number of each color means lower denomination chips deplete quickly

customer_reviews.title: Their thin and feels like a hard plastic maybe
customer_reviews.text: Update:5-31-18 Poker chips are lower quality as I figured,the paint came off the chips and the dealer button This isn't for poker players that would use in heavy play. Maybe for occasionally home playing then paint rubs off its ok IG. I would invest in a better chipset like Las Vegas or Da Vinci or Monte Carlo sets. There ok ..it works but not weighed to my liking in Chips! Their thin and feels like a hard plastic maybe..I can't tell. But I am use to playing with higher quality chips. Big ups for being in tin container and a place to store them if u want.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Pleasant

customer_reviews.title: Seem perfectly good for the reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice heft and feel. I'm sure you can get better, but these don't feel inordinately cheap. There are equal numbers of all 5 denominations - I personally would have found it more useful to have only 4 denominations/colors, with double of the smallest denomination, but I just made both the black and white chips each worth "1", and accomplished the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: DogOnTheBay

customer_reviews.title: Good chips for a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some poker chips to conduct a token economy system with my son to help him improve his school performance. The cheap plastic ones weren't a lot cheaper than these, so I opted for these. I'm glad I did. They feel substantial and the heft makes them feel more valuable to my son. Maybe not professional quality (how would I know), but they feel good and seem well made. Only time will tell how they hold up. Although the description says 4 colors of 100, our set is 5 colors, which is fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: DaMacGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great price, perfect product
customer_reviews.text: As an add-on item, this is fantastic! So affordable and perfect chips. I understand everyone received different products, but I received 4 packages of exactly what was pictured. We love them and they were a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: They are great they feel nice and my friends love them. I only wish the box they came in had some sort of plastic film to prevent them from getting out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Suro

customer_reviews.title: Casino Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I dealt blackjack for about six years at various casinos. I am planning to apply for another dealer job having been out of the industry for almost 20 years and ordered these chips to practice with. These are very close to the same quality as you would find in the casino. Not light plastic like what i was expecting. I am beyond pleased.
customer_reviews.author: lisa p

customer_reviews.title: Nice poker chips
customer_reviews.text: Filled a nice, hand-made, wooden, poker box we bought locally. Wanted better quality chips for it. These were very nice and worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: DE in WA

customer_reviews.title: Great chips
customer_reviews.text: Great chips! The case came cracked (it's cheap quality and that's why only four stars) but the chips are really nice. Good weight and will probably order another set soon and put them all in a round spinning rack. Happy with this purchase. Recommended. Four stars.
customer_reviews.author: B Nelson

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality for the price and amount. I bought 4 boxes and they all come with a plastic sleeve that chips sit in to make them easy to pass around and store
customer_reviews.author: Jacob J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but I was looking for cheap plastic chips. Not busine because outter plastic was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Penguin Queen

customer_reviews.title: Fun to play with! Durable!
customer_reviews.text: With five different colors and 100 poker chips its great for starters. 1) They are a great deal and wonderful for game nights, these are PERFECT. 2) I'm not sure what these are made of, but they have a pleasantly rough texture, kind of ceramic-y. I don't think running them over with a car would even break them. They are incredibly fun to play with! Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AutumnSkye

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, decently heavy, and really cheap. Only about five bucks more than the really chintzy thin, light plastic ones, and ten times better in quality. These would be considered "nice" chips for anyone short of a casino or a really serious poker player. Not sure how you play, but you might want two sets ... 20 each of five colors here.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: But they are a nice weight, I didn't weigh
customer_reviews.text: Are they casino quality, no. But they are a nice weight, I didn't weigh, but have no doubt they are 11.5 g. They make a great sound and relaly look pretty nice for the price. There were a few sharp edges, but they scrape off easily with a fingernail. Very nice for the price. Can't complain. I got the dice patter which is pretty classic.
customer_reviews.author: Cap'n

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: Not the most stylistic chips but they have a good weight and pretty good durability. If you looking for a quality, lower price set and don't mind the plain aesthetic these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Chips
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Just what I was looking for. High quality and great weight for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Chips
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and sturdy chips. They feel like Las Vegas style chips.
customer_reviews.author: 1 OC Girly Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a casino themed party. Just as expected! Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Janet Quarles

customer_reviews.title: It was okay
customer_reviews.text: Saved me a trip to Walmart, but wasn’t really cheaper. The holder is kinda junk, so you’re gonna want to buy a different case, but the chips are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sherryl C.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and value. Heavy like real Las Vegas poker chips. Lowest price I could find anywhere for quality chips
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in my classroom, and I'm very pleased with the weight and quality for the price. I don't know anything about using them for actual poker games, but they look impressive.
customer_reviews.author: lgraham011

customer_reviews.title: Great Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: These have a have a good weight to them and fit neatly into the accompanying trays. We have enjoyed using them.
customer_reviews.author: DK Memphis

customer_reviews.title: I didn't mean to buy these but they were nice they will be great for any game I guess ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't mean to buy these but they were nice they will be great for any game I guess they go with or just to use for party
customer_reviews.author: Joanne King

customer_reviews.title: no values on them
customer_reviews.text: These chips are nice and have a good weight to them. They don't break when dropped and they don't have any values on them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great, heavy weight chips
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, heavy enough to be used by the residents at our senior center. They all like these chips.
customer_reviews.author: VS

customer_reviews.title: They are a very good quality chip
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these poker chips for a charitable gaming event. We ordered them purely for decoration. They are a very good quality chip. I liked that they came in 4 different color groups. It added a lot of spice to our tables! I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Grow

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love these chips, the whole case was heavy because of a well made slot holder for the chips. Definitely will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Not a great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a learning tool for my grandson. They have a funny odor that makes them unpleasant to have open. Plus a dusty feel and drab colors. Not a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Diane Watts

customer_reviews.title: Quality chips at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use for a Las Vegas themed party. I put them in mason jars with dice and candles. It was a hit! They went great with the theme! They are the thicker, heavier quality chips. The little dice around the edge was a nice touch. My husband plans to use these for poker night now. :) I would buy them all over again! Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: A.Bee

customer_reviews.title: For the price, its fine!
customer_reviews.text: The chips are fine, the paint was coming out and not perfectly made. That being said, for the price they are not the worst deal out there! For just playing around when drunk, it is a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Geet T.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good quality chips and tray for the price. Colors as advertised just white is not snow white but I am ok with it. Heavy but not unmanagable
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A good poker chip set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice poker chip set. I had bought it used so there was a few pieces that were missing but otherwise it has been very fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: A risky buy
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need all 100 chips but it's irritating that it didn't come with them all. This says that styles may very and I was unlucky enough to get the cardinal industries brand ones. They look dingy right out of the package due to poor quality control and it was two chips short. I need them too soon to send them back, so I will live with the issues but if you want a full decent set go to a store and pick some out. This is a stupid risk of a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Pemrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Chips
customer_reviews.text: The chips look like the casino chips without the label on them. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: So nice, NO plastic here
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight, and the feel...fun and better than the old plastic chips!
customer_reviews.author: OregonNative

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality chips at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: These chips have a very nice weight and feel to them and seem like good quality. They are advertised with only four colors included, but mine came with all five just as shown in the photo and the tray to keep them in is very handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel_Man

customer_reviews.title: Great chips!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pieces. I got 20 of each color pictured. They feel pretty sturdy. The only thing I didn't like, which is so minor, is that the colors are not very bright. They are somewhat faded. Other than that, great quality chips at a very good price!
customer_reviews.author: AmznGenius

customer_reviews.title: Better off with fisher Price!
customer_reviews.text: The white strips fall off after use no numbers on chips at all
customer_reviews.author: Jose Tabar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice chips, have a good weight, sound good when they hit the table
customer_reviews.author: CN

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's a great deal. Sick chips that aren't cheap like the ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a great deal. Sick chips that aren't cheap like the plastic little ones that you get at Walmart..
customer_reviews.author: KurtKurt

customer_reviews.title: They're fine
customer_reviews.text: The chips are fine. They're cheap, plenty heavy, stack well, and are great for supplementing your chip case.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W. Medders

customer_reviews.title: Great for motivating kid's good habits
customer_reviews.text: We use these tokens to be earned by our children to encourage good habits. Five token earn one gold chip  that can be cashed or used to buy games toys by our kids.
customer_reviews.author: Prosaic

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Heavy pieces. Serves well for what it was purchased for, which is for light home use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality chips. My kids drop them on the floor all the time and they have not yet chipped or scratched
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: One was cracked
customer_reviews.text: ONE of the chips was cracked In the package . Chips were fine other than that and a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: some of the chips were chipped upon opening
customer_reviews.text: good weight, will do the job for a poker or other chip game. Some of the chips were chipped when I opened the box though.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas316

customer_reviews.title: The packaging and item were both broken
customer_reviews.text: Item was broken in package. I am really disappointed. This was for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Carmen-Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Heavy weight chips and well made. Wish the markings were a bit clearer. Otherwise, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Content seems fine. I cannot write a review on the actual ...
customer_reviews.text: The box was trashed upon arrival. It had been ripped open and tape closed. Content seems fine. I cannot write a review on the actual product at this time. The chips are for a gift, so I won't be able to wrap it as is.
customer_reviews.author: SteveF

customer_reviews.title: But all in all we are happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: The chips are a little uneven in sizes. Caused some issues with training. But all in all we are happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Parker

customer_reviews.title: Not delivered as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically ordered this set because the picture showed 4 sets of 25. What I got was 5 sets of 20 which is not what I needed. I wanted a matching set for the chips I already have because i needed 50 chips of each color. I color code my classroom with red, blue & green.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Odom

customer_reviews.title: For being plastic these ain't bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these 1 day ago and i love em. They have a nice weight to them. The color is a bit faded but i don't mind it, they're really nice. Also the my sound real too when shuffling or tossing them in the table placing your bet,these ain't bad at all. These are good for Poker night with friends and such.. I recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Organized and fun
customer_reviews.text: The products came earlier than expected and very well wrapped. My friends and I play this game all the time, after dinner, on the balcony, or we take it with us when we go hiking. It's very organized, we can fit the cards and chips all in one sturdy plastic container. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Crosscountrygirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: These chips are nice quality and a good addition for any home gambler. We use these to play craps at home. These are not casino quality but very nice quality for home entertainment. The plastic case can be a bit hard to open bit it's nice and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Well..
customer_reviews.text: The chips feel great. The paint job does look horrible but you don't stare at them. My real problem is that the description says it brings the dealer chip and poker instructions and I did not receive them. All I have is the chips. The plastic holder is broken on a corner, which indicates it must have fallen because that plastic is very thick. I now have to improvise dealer and blind chips.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Guigni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set - very well made. It was perfect for game night!!
customer_reviews.author: albert thebarge

customer_reviews.title: They work good
customer_reviews.text: i'm not an expert on poker chips, but these do the trick!they're made of great quality and they're good to use for poker night
customer_reviews.author: Luis D Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Poker Chip set
customer_reviews.text: The plastic container was broken when I received this chip set. The quality of the chips are pretty decent, however, I found the same product at Walmart for $7.00. So I could have just bought this there and I would've also had a good container.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and perfect for what I needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: The Crafty Author

customer_reviews.title: It's the same garbage that they sell at walmart
customer_reviews.text: Product listing says 4 colors- I got 5. It's the same garbage that they sell at walmart.
customer_reviews.author: N. Story

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I used for Vegas themed party. These were the best I could find for the price. Not cheesy at all, served purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Brimaria

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these after reading the reviews and it indeed was a good buy. At $10 a set, I doubt you could find a better quality chips at a lower price. It IS made out of cheaper plastic material, but still heavy and solid enough to feel like a poker chip rather than some cheap fisher price toy. If you need poker chips on a tight budget, I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baek

customer_reviews.title: The chips are great, but 100 chips isn't as many as you ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy a bigger set. The chips are great, but 100 chips isn't as many as you think when playing with 4 or more people.
customer_reviews.author: NERD

customer_reviews.title: Feels and sounds great in the hands
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Feels and sounds great in the hands.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I totally forgot to check reviews BEFORE I purchased it. A total disappointment. First it does only have four colors. Second, compared to the Da Vinci ones which I purchased after this, are way more smooth and feel better in hand. The cutting edges are pretty rough on this one.
customer_reviews.author: 15anthony15

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will fit our needs
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet. Looks like it will fit our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: More than what i expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought some poker chips at this price and it was weak and flimsy. This set is awesome. I can shuffle them and there is a nice weight / feel to them. maybe a little less than 11.5 but not by much. Recommended to the weekend poker player.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: The kids like them, and should we want to play some ...
customer_reviews.text: We got these as tokens for our kids. The kids like them, and should we want to play some poker, we are good to go :)
customer_reviews.author: Miss Piggy 4444

customer_reviews.title: tray came cracked
customer_reviews.text: overall decent set of chips and the tray it came with was just what I was looking for (5 rows of 20 chips). however when delivered, the tray was cracked and unusable as shards of plastic was falling out when I opened the box. that said, for under $10 bucks it's okay. if tray wasn't smashed to s***, I'd rate it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These chips aren't as high quality as something you'd find at a casino. They are matte, not glossy. But the weight is pretty good, and for the price you can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Lilley

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE 5 COLOR PACKAGES, yes other reviews say ...
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE 5 COLOR PACKAGES, yes other reviews say they are 4 color packages, cheap chips but work perfectly for a friendly game at home with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Oni

customer_reviews.title: For the money- i think it is woth it
customer_reviews.text: Each color comes individually wrapped and comes in a plastic case which can be used over again. Each of the chips is of good quality and for the price, I know it was worth it to me
customer_reviews.author: Bread Basket

customer_reviews.title: Fun poker chips
customer_reviews.text: Great for playing poker at home. Love these chips. Good feel to them
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Learn and Play
customer_reviews.text: I got this to play with my grandsons - no I am not a bad person, but believe it or not by playing blackjack it helped them to learn to add and at the same time it was fun playing. I think anything you can use to make it fun in learning it worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: 100 Poker chips
customer_reviews.text: Poker chips...100 of them. Hard to screw this one up.
customer_reviews.author: Lothar of the Hill People

customer_reviews.title: The figure for the poker chip set was deceptive. ...
customer_reviews.text: The figure for the poker chip set was deceptive. I use the poker chips with children helping them learn math. I needed 25 in each color; instead I got 20 in five colors.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Not just for Poker
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a technique to get my child to do his chores and with each chip he earns a different time and then he can trade them in to get time on the computer or phone. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: The person who won that basket loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in a Realy for Life give away basket as a raffel. The person who won that basket loved it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D R

customer_reviews.title: Little chip...on my chip
customer_reviews.text: One of my chips came with a bit of a chip in the coating. budum tss* Other than that they're awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Hernan Guardado

customer_reviews.title: great product, it doesn't come with a case
customer_reviews.text: great product, it doesn't come with a case, if you don't have one- you must buy one otherwise it troublesome putting back in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Brian & Elizabeth Hulse

customer_reviews.title: These chips were amazing. Nice and heavy and I only sent them ...
customer_reviews.text: These chips were amazing. Nice and heavy and I only sent them back because they didn't have the denomination on them.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and weight.
customer_reviews.text: We needed more chips for large groups playing Tripoley and bought these as a supplement. We are very pleased with the quality and the weight. We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bastanza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great. Wish i bought more. I would recommend a larger amount or a more complete set
customer_reviews.author: daniel v.

customer_reviews.title: It's Great
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with 5 colors instead of 4... I hear a lot of people in other chips complaining about getting 4 colors and not 5 but mine is the exact opposite. It's really good quality and fun but I'll give it 3 stars because I wanted to 4 colors(Even if some might thing 5 is better, I have my reasons)
customer_reviews.author: Henry Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice clay chips with a Casino feel. The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: pete schindler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: These poker chips are very nice. They are similar to real poker chips in casinos. I'm very happy with them and think they were a good price. They are much better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: They aren’t value numbered. You can determine the value of the chips!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chips! Good weight and feel. Very good deal!
customer_reviews.author: shellie bagley

customer_reviews.title: 100 Poker Chips
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a club I belong to so they could be used for a scavenger hunt. They worked out perfectly and the club, as well as myself are happy with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great fir the money
customer_reviews.text: Got these as an add on for really cheap and the quality is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like Vegas
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. I used the chips for creating a costume. The weight and feel was exactly what I wanted. Item was exactly as described - would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mel w

customer_reviews.title: Flaws, but it works
customer_reviews.text: There are definitely flaws on the chips, but it gets the job done. Price is good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: These have nice casino feel to them. I'm glad I chose these.
customer_reviews.author: moody

customer_reviews.title: Poker chips
customer_reviews.text: Ordered them for my teenage grandson, and he liked them. He doesn't like the old plastic "clinky" kind.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Munford

customer_reviews.title: Chips themselves are nice. They come in a little rack
customer_reviews.text: Chips themselves are nice. They come in a little rack.. But it'd be nice if the box held together a little better for long term storage
customer_reviews.author: bostonmatrix

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These chips are steel coated in plastic. There were one hundred of them, and they feel like the right weight, but that's about all that is right with them. They all look and feel pretty rough, with some chips and dings.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: The chips feel good but are of varying thickness
customer_reviews.text: The chips feel good but are of varying thickness. The print on the chips is misaligned at a number of places. Very good for a casual game and worth the price of $10 that I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Ashish

customer_reviews.title: A nice purchase
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on time and it was as described by the seller. I enjoy them playing poker. They really feel good!
customer_reviews.author: Peri

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a bit more "rubbery" feel to them, but they are very plastic with sharp ugly edges. So they are definitely not casino grade but then again, for the price, what do you expect? Still, they are nice and heavy and suits my purposes just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Wood

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Perfect match to current high quality set.
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Perfect match to a really nice set that we have. Not much else to say...
customer_reviews.author: Mikel J

customer_reviews.title: NIce chips, good feal
customer_reviews.text: These are nice chips (although I'm not an expert on poker chips) They have a nice sound and feel, and seem strong, none have broken, even with my kids dropping them..
customer_reviews.author: Alpine-X

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slow to ship but when they arrived they were just as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Huey125

product_meta.title: 100 Ct. Poker Chips Set 11.5 gram (styles will vary)
product_meta.description:
Size:Basic packThis professional quality set includes 100 championship edition 11.5g poker chips in 4 different colors. The perfect match for poker night with family and friends!

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This professional quality set includes 100 championship edition 11.5g poker chips in 4 different colors. The perfect match for poker night with family and friends!
